product_name: Menasha Ridge Press Long Trails of the Southeast
long_description: Discover the uncrowded, long-hike opportunities of the region. Long Trails covers seven trails in eight states, for a total of 600 miles. Author: Johnny Molloy. Softcover, 240 pages, black-and-white photos. Menasha Ridge Press, copyright 2002. At-a-glance information on trail conditions and all the details you need to know, with mile-by-mile descriptions.
short_description: Discover the uncrowded, long-hike opportunities of the region. Long Trails covers seven trails in eight states, for a total of 600 miles.
